description: Schema for storing disease data of various terminologies (e.g. MONDO or free text).
title: Diseases

___description.description: Ontology term description for the disease terms.
___description.title: Disease description

___synonyms.description: List of synonyms of the disease.
___synonyms.title: Synonyms

___term.description: Ontology name or label describing the diseases.
___term.title: Disease name

___phenotypes.description: List of Phenotypes (HPO IDs) for the free text disease term.
___phenotypes.title: Phenotype(s)

___freetext.description: Boolean value to flag free text disease term
___freetext.title: Flag for free text disease

___diseaseId.description: Disease term identifier consisting of the prefix (e.g. MONDO:) followed by number.
___diseaseId.title: Unique identifier of disease term
